attributes.action: Encourage Her Majesty to revoke Phillip Green's knighthood
attributes.background: In light of the BHS pension scandal and today being named as the man at the centre of a disgraceful 'sexual harassment, racist abuse and bullying' scandal', Phillip Green is undeserving of the accolade. It is embarrassing for the United Kingdom to have this man deemed worthy of a knighthood.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/having-honours-taken-away-forfeiture
